name: BATTLESHIP®
description:
Your Fleet. Your Fight. OUR Fate.

Take command of a US Naval fleet to wage war against an unknown alien force. Secure the seas before it’s too late.

Defend and protect your Battleships.
Play in DUEL! Mode to fire on your enemies!
Call on your fleet!
Fire At Will!
